name: the apocalypse, but make it fashion. ✨

content.html: Will I move away from the US some day? Maybe! But it won’t be out of a misguided belief that the problems that exist in the US are somehow problems that exist exclusively within our borders. I know better than that.
content.value:
Will I move away from the US some day?

Maybe!

But it won’t be out of a misguided belief that the problems that exist in the US are somehow problems that exist exclusively within our borders.

I know better than that.
